features.featureTitle: Update only the selected Hero headline element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[1]/div[1]/h1[1]) so the H1 text is visually contained within its glass panel on all screen sizes (no overflow/cropping), by making the typography responsive and allowing safe wrapping within the box while keeping the existing headline text unchanged.
